title: Songs of Light and Dark: Poetic Meditations on the Self and Random Haikus
description: Songs of Light and Dark is a spiritual poetry book sprinkled with haikus that should be on the bookshelf of anyone looking for a clear expression of the non-duality of the Divine.It is the intimate reflection of a spiritual seeker willing to transcend the mundane and finding absolute faith in life, beyond the fleeting reality of personal interactions and illusions.These are poems of love with a bit of an edge. They convey the honest musings and contradictions of a soul determined to find God in herself and everywhere else.
author: Yol Swan
